mapper.update:
update EHR_DATA_INFO
MSG_ID = #{msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATIENT_NAME = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEALTH_CARD_ID = #{healthCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NO = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL_NO = #{telNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_STREET = #{addressStreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_TIME = #{outTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCUMENT_UNIQUE_ID = #{documentUniqueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPOSITORY_UNIQUE_ID = #{repositoryUniqueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_AT=sysdate
where id = #{id}
